structure.unit: ARTICLE IV. HOMESTEAD COMMUNITY REDEVELOPMENT AND REVITALIZATION TRUST FUND

text.section:
Sec. 30A-105. Public purpose.
This article [Ordinance No. 94-125] is hereby declared to be for a public purpose and for the welfare of the citizens of Miami-Dade County, Florida, and shall be liberally construed to effectuate the purpose thereof.
